5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Samurah bin Jundab that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:“Whoever abandons Friday deliberately, let him give a Dinar in charity, and if he cannot afford that, then (let him give) half a Dinar.”

chapter.ara-name: باب فِيمَنْ تَرَكَ الْجُمُعَةَ مِنْ غَيْرِ عُذْرٍ
chapter.eng-name: Those who do not attend Friday prayer without an excuse
